classSpec.desc: groups those elements which appear at the component level in spoken texts only.
所匯集的元素僅出現在口說文件的組成層次。

macroSpec.gloss: 混合基礎口說文件組成
macroSpec.desc: contains a string used in constructing the definition of macro.component used in the mixed base tag set.
包含一字串，用來定義使用於混合基礎標籤組的macro.component。

elementSpec.desc: a stretch of speech usually preceded and followed by silence or by a change of speaker.
一種言語表達的描繪，通常在說話前後是一段沉默、或是另一個人的說話。

attDef.desc: indicates the nature of the transition between this utterance and the previous one.
指出此項發聲說話和前向發聲說話當中轉變過程的特性。

valItem.gloss: this utterance begins without unusual pause or rapidity.
此項發聲說話的開始並無異常的暫停或異常迅速。
this utterance begins with a markedly shorter pause than normal.
此項發聲說話的開始明顯帶有比平常要短的暫停。
this utterance begins before the previous one has finished.
此項發聲說話在前一項還未結束前就開始。
this utterance begins after a noticeable pause.
此項發聲說話在一段明顯的暫停之後開始。

elementSpec.desc: a pause either between or within utterances.
說話之間或說話時的暫停。
any vocalized but not necessarily lexical phenomenon, for example voiced pauses, non-lexical backchannels, etc.
用聲音發出但未必是詞彙的話語，例如聲音的暫停、非詞彙的backchannel等。

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the phenomenon is repeated.
指出該現象是否重複發生。

elementSpec.desc: any communicative phenomenon, not necessarily vocalized, for example a gesture, frown, etc.
任何溝通現象，未必是口說表達，例如手勢、皺眉等。

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the phenomenon is repeated.
指出該現象是否重複發生。

elementSpec.desc: any phenomenon or occurrence, not necessarily vocalized or communicative, for example incidental noises or other events affecting communication.
任何未必是口說的或溝通上的現象或發生情況，例如偶然的噪音或其他影響溝通的事件。

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the phenomenon is repeated.
指出該現象是否重複發生。

elementSpec.desc: a passage of written text revealed to participants in the course of a spoken text.
在口說的過程中，參與者可觀看的一段書面文字。

attDef.desc: categorizes the kind of writing in some way, for example as a subtitle, noticeboard etc.
將書面文字分類，例如字幕、記事板等。
points to a bibliographic citation in the header giving a full description of the source or script of the writing.
連結到標頭中的書目引用，以完整提供該書面文字的來源或底稿描述。
attDef.valDesc: Must be a valid identifier for a bibliographic element in the TEI header
必須是TEI標頭內標明的書目元素的有效識別符碼。

attDef.desc: indicates whether the writing is revealed all at once or gradually.
指出該書面文字是一次全部出現或逐步出現

elementSpec.desc: marks the point at which some paralinguistic feature of a series of utterances by any one speaker changes.
所標記的位置表示任一說話者在一連串說話中的附屬語言特性的改變。

attDef.desc: specifies the new state of the paralinguistic feature specified.
說明改變後的附屬語言特性狀況。
attDef.valDesc: An open list (for an example of possible values, see )
開放式列表 (可能屬性值範例詳見)
